The Board of Supervisors may provide by separate resolution such appeals procedures as it may deem appropriate to facilitate the levy and enforcement of the special taxes. Such procedures may provide for the appeal of confirmed special taxes to an official of the City responsible for the collection of the special taxes and grounds upon and times within which such appeals must be made. There shall be no appeal to the Board of Supervisors from the decision of the appointed official or other official of the City. The taking of an administrative appeal under this Article shall be a precondition to bringing any action under Section 
43.10.11 of this Article. 
(Ord. 216-09, File No. 090938, App. 10/29/2009)
